title: Programming Practical Skill Enhancement: Short-Intensive Module for Improving Web-Based Information Evaluation Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply five or more evaluation criteria (author expertise, source credibility, recency, etc.) to assess information reliability during web searches
Learners can curate three or more reliable information sources on a given topic in mobile environments and explain their rationale
Learners can iteratively improve information evaluation processes (three or more cycles) by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
